ecr_identification.ecr_number: Auto-generated ECR tracking number. Use 'TBD' or 'AUTO' if not yet assigned.
ecr_identification.originator: Name of person submitting the ECR

priority_and_robot_info.priority_level: Must be one of: CRITICAL, HIGH, MEDIUM, LOW
priority_and_robot_info.serial_number_range: Serial number range affected based on the component ID(e.g., '1.1-1.3' or 'All')
priority_and_robot_info.all_models: Boolean: true if all models are affected

problem_statement.issue_description: Clear description of the problem or opportunity
problem_statement.source_origin: Array of strings from allowed values
problem_statement.severity: Must be one of: Critical, High, Medium, Low
problem_statement.customer_impact: Boolean: true if deployed units are affected

proposed_change.affected_subsystems: Array of strings from allowed values
proposed_change.detailed_description: Detailed description of the proposed change

affected_components.part_numbers: Comma-separated list of affected part numbers

proposed_change.justification: Business case: why this change is necessary

safety_impact.affects_safety_functions: Boolean: true if safety systems are affected
safety_impact.safety_systems_affected: E-Stop, Collision Avoidance, Speed Limiting, Personnel Detection

interchangeability.old_new_parts_mixed: Boolean: Can old and new parts be mixed?
interchangeability.forward_compatible: Boolean: Does new part work in old robots?
interchangeability.backward_compatible: Boolean: Does old part work with new design?

field_retrofit.ota_capable: Boolean: Can update be done OTA (over-the-air)?
field_retrofit.customer_notification_required: Boolean: Do customers need to be notified?

cost_analysis.unit_cost_impact: Dollar amount per robot as string
cost_analysis.expected_savings_benefits: Expected savings or benefits in dollars

testing_validation.required_testing: Array of strings from allowed values
testing_validation.test_plan_reference: Test plan document number or reference

implementation_plan.documentation_updates_required: Array of strings from allowed values

attachments.attachment_types: Array of strings from allowed values

approval_workflow.note: Approvers section - typically filled during approval process, not by LLM

affected_subsystems: Safety Systems (E-Stop, Collision Avoidance, Speed Limiting)
attachment_types: Photos or videos of the issue
Software code or version control references
